extension.summary: AI-IT Inc Professional NVR System Integration
extension.description:
Connect your Kodi media center to the AI-IT Inc NVR system for professional security monitoring.
Features: • Live camera streaming with multiple quality options • Recording playback with timeline navigation • Motion detection alerts and event review • Multi-camera grid view for comprehensive monitoring • PTZ camera control (pan, tilt, zoom) • Snapshot capture and gallery management • Smart home integration support • Hardware acceleration for smooth playback
Transform your entertainment system into a professional security hub with AI-IT Inc's advanced NVR technology.
extension.disclaimer: This addon requires an AI-IT Inc NVR system to function. Visit aiit-inc.com for more information.
